name: Grilled Chicken Hoagie
description: Simple doesn’t mean boring – juicy & tender grilled chicken pieces, tucked into toasted buns, loaded with sauce and topped with fresh veggies makes for a delish meal. Not able to find chicken breast fillets? Simply cut chicken breasts into strips.
preparation: For the sauce, in a bowl combine mayonnaise with sauce mix, ketchup, and relish. Set aside.
Coat chicken with oil and seasoning. Place on grill. Grill with lid closed until cooked, about 3 min per side. Add buns for the last 1 min of cooking; grill until lightly toasted.
Meanwhile, coarsely chop spinach and prepare toppings, if using.
To assemble, spread toasted buns with sauce. Add chicken, spinach, and toppings.
tips: Throw some red peppers on the grill too, or use up any leftover fresh or grilled veggies kicking around your fridge.
Can’t find hoagie buns? Swap in hot dog buns, ciabatta buns, or use a baguette.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced fresh veggies of your choice.
